channel.title: Universal Music on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Universal Music on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Heyoon Gets ‘Addicted’ to Deep House on New Single
item.description: Global Korean pop star Heyoon is diving into the world of electronic music with her latest single “Addicted,” a deep house track that marks a significant creative evolution for the artist.
